page.title: 08FARMING-RAMPSIDE HALL
page.content: The farmer owned the land where the gas terminal is now.The farm has beef cows, chickens and cocks and the farmer has a dog called Floss.He uses his tractor about once a week .He thinks that the brown cows are the best. .His cows give three-four gallons of milk a day .What he doesnt drink he gives to his animals.He is expecting calves soon.He has one game cock and two chickens.He's never used upto date methods for milking.Food for the animals is very expensive to buy.The farmer has oats,cornflakes and something like gerbil food.He has two tractors and a conveyorbelt.He has a milking machine which is 30 years old .He has modernized the farm considerably.His first barn fell down.
